title: The Silence of the Lambs

awardEventDetails.title: 1992 Winner Oscar
awardEventDetails.description: Edward Saxon - Kenneth Utt - Ron Bozman (The Silence of the Lambs (1991) became the third film in Academy history to win the "Big Five" Academy Awards for producing, directing, acting, and screenwriting following It Happened One Night (1934) and One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975).)

70 wins & 51 nominations

Academy Awards, USA

1992 Winner Oscar
Best Picture
Edward Saxon - Kenneth Utt - Ron Bozman (The Silence of the Lambs (1991) became the third film in Academy history to win the "Big Five" Academy Awards for producing, directing, acting, and screenwriting following It Happened One Night (1934) and One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975).)
